explains: v. 分配（assign 的过去分词）；指定；委派
wordGroup: assign work 派活；指派工作
assign a value 分配一个值；赋值

sentences.en: They've assigned their best man to the job.
sentences.cn: 他们指派了最优秀的人担任这项工作。

sentences.en: The sergeant assigned him to KP.
sentences.cn: 中士派他下伙房去帮厨。

sentences.en: I was assigned to B platoon.
